truth: -  "Einstein's theory of relativity includes the special theory of relativity and the general theory of relativity."
fiction: -  "Einstein's theory of relativity includes the theory of evolution and the theory of gravity."

truth: -  "The theory of relativity states that the laws of physics are the same for all non-accelerating observers."
fiction: -  "The theory of relativity states that the laws of physics change depending on the observer's favorite color."

truth: -  "According to the theory of relativity, space and time are interwoven into a single continuum known as space-time."
fiction: -  "According to the theory of relativity, space and time are separate entities that never interact."

truth: -  "In the theory of relativity, the speed of light in a vacuum is the same for all observers, regardless of their motion or of the motion of the source of the light."
fiction: -  "In the theory of relativity, the speed of light in a vacuum changes depending on the observer's speed or the motion of the source of the light."

truth: -  "Einstein's theory of relativity predicts that time slows down or speeds up depending on how fast you move relative to something else."
fiction: -  "Einstein's theory of relativity predicts that time stops completely when you move faster than a snail."

truth: -  "General relativity describes gravity as a curvature of space-time caused by mass and energy."
fiction: -  "General relativity describes gravity as a straight line in space-time caused by mass and energy."

truth: -  "Einstein's theory of relativity led to the prediction of black holes."
fiction: -  "Einstein's theory of relativity led to the prediction of unicorns."

truth: -  "The theory of relativity states that the speed of light is a constant, at 299,792 kilometers per second."
fiction: -  "The theory of relativity states that the speed of light is variable, depending on the time of day."

truth: -  "According to relativity, mass and energy are interchangeable, as expressed in the equation E=mc^2."
fiction: -  "According to relativity, mass and energy are unrelated, as expressed in the equation E=m/c^2."

truth: -  "The theory of relativity predicts the existence of gravitational waves, which were first detected in 2015."
fiction: -  "The theory of relativity predicts the existence of musical waves, which can be heard by special instruments."

truth: -  "In relativity, the passage of time is affected by gravity, with time passing slower in stronger gravitational fields."
fiction: -  "In relativity, the passage of time is affected by the color of the environment, with time passing slower in blue rooms."

truth: -  "Relativity shows that mass and energy cause curvature of space-time, which we perceive as gravity."
fiction: -  "Relativity shows that mass and energy cause the flattening of space-time, which we perceive as gravity."

truth: -  "The theory of relativity led to the development of nuclear energy and nuclear weapons."
fiction: -  "The theory of relativity led to the development of solar-powered cars and wind turbines."

truth: -  "Relativity predicts that the universe is expanding, a prediction confirmed by observations of distant galaxies."
fiction: -  "Relativity predicts that the universe is shrinking, a prediction confirmed by observations of nearby stars."

truth: -  "According to relativity, the path of light is bent when it passes through a gravitational field."
fiction: -  "According to relativity, the path of light is straightened when it passes through a gravitational field."

truth: -  "Relativity shows that the universe has no center and no edge."
fiction: -  "Relativity shows that the universe has a definitive center and edge, located near the Milky Way."

truth: -  "In relativity, the concept of simultaneity is relative to the observer's frame of reference."
fiction: -  "In relativity, the concept of simultaneity is absolute and does not depend on the observer's frame of reference."

truth: -  "Relativity predicts the existence of wormholes, shortcuts through space-time."
fiction: -  "Relativity predicts the existence of time machines, devices that can transport people to any point in time."

truth: -  "According to relativity, the universe began with the Big Bang, a state of extremely high density and temperature."
fiction: -  "According to relativity, the universe began with a giant snowball fight among celestial beings."
